## iframe in table

<html>
<head>
	<title>Iframe in Table Example</title>
	<style>
		table, th, td {
			border: 1px solid black;
			border-collapse: collapse;
		}
		iframe {
			width: 100%;
			height: 100%;
		}
	</style>
</head>
<body>
	<table>
		<tr>
			<th>Column 1</th>
			<th>Column 2</th>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Row 1, Column 1</td>
			<td><iframe src="https://www.iso.org/en/ics/01.140.20.html"></iframe></td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
			<td><iframe src="https://www.youtube.com"></iframe></td>
		</tr>
	</table>
</body>
</html>
